Name: Infinite Game Works Episode 1
About the game: The second game about making games! Experience the life of a high school indie game developer. Care for and build relationships with your teammates! Yuta is following in the footsteps of Justin (from the first game) and wants to become an indie game developer. With his teammates, will he be able to fulfill his dream or will the drama overcome him? In-depth Indie Game Development Simulation Manage funding, game ideas and your team More story (just like you asked for) Buff System More characters Multiple endings Eat snacks in-game (for better or worse)
